cmp: 门 (opening/door/gate/doorway/gateway/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy))
mng: between, among, within a definite time or space, room, section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars, classifier for rooms
gap, to separate, to thin out (seedlings), to sow discontent

exm.mng: period of time, time, time period, period
in between, within that interval, in the meantime
